Title: Episode #1.9
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Carly Wray (teleplay by), Jennifer Haley (teleplay by), Carly Wray (story by)
Actors: Sonny Valicenti, Jonathan Groff, Holt McCallany, Greg Harpold
Plot: Holden's methods during a disturbing interview with mass murderer Richard Speck create dissension among the team and kick off an internal FBI probe.
